scripts.install:all: npm install && cd api-gateway && npm install && cd ../services/gdta-service && npm install && cd ../course-service && npm install && cd ../recommendation-service && npm install && cd ../microcontent-service && npm install && cd ../.. && cd client && npm install && cd ..
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:gdta" "npm run dev:course" "npm run dev:recommendation" "npm run dev:microcontent"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n gateway,gdta,course,rec,micro,client -c blue,green,yellow,magenta,cyan,white "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:gdta" "npm run dev:course" "npm run dev:recommendation" "npm run dev:microcontent" "npm run dev:client"
scripts.start:mongodb: docker run -d --name coursedesign-mongodb-local -e MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME=admin -e MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD=mongodb -e MONGO_INITDB_DATABASE=course_design -p 27017:27017 mongo:7.0 || echo 'MongoDB already running'
